EntryName	SOS1_HUMAN
ProteinName	Son of sevenless homolog 1 (SOS-1)
GeneName	SOS1
Length	314
Function	Promotes the exchange of Ras-bound GDP by GTP (PubMed:8493579). Probably by promoting Ras activation, regulates phosphorylation of MAP kinase MAPK3/ERK1 in response to EGF (PubMed:17339331). Catalytic component of a trimeric complex that participates in transduction of signals from Ras to Rac by promoting the Rac-specific guanine nucleotide exchange factor (GEF) activity (By similarity).
